Security-aware Data Provenance for Multi-domain Software-defined Networks

November 2024 - September 2025

This project was funded by the Research Training Bursary (2024) internal grant from Deakin Cyber Research and Innovation Centre. Supervised by Dr. Fariha Tasmin Jaigirdar, Dr. Kallol Krishna Karmakar, and Dr. Adnan Anwar, this was my first formal (academic) research project. The resulting paper has been published↗ in Computers & Security (Q1) and research poster displayed at the 28th International Symposium on Research on Attacks, Intrusions, and Defenses (RAID 2025).

Project Summary

Please find the above poster (PDF) summarizing the idea behind PRISM-Prov. If you are having trouble viewing it, you can access the file here↗. A more complete "writeup" can be found in my original paper↗.
